casebody.data:
David W. THOMPSON
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.; PRLRAP, Inc.; Nationwide Trustee Services, Inc.; BAC Home Loans Servicing, LP; Saxon Mortgage Services, Inc.; Wendy B. Cole; and Matressa R. Morris. No. 317P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. David W. Thompson, for Thompson, David W. Brian M. Rowlson, Charlotte, for Bank of America, N.A., et al. Julia B. Hartley, Charlotte, for Saxon Mortgage Services, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by Plaintiff on the 8th of September 2015 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30(substantial constitutional question), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the notice of appeal is

"Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of September 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
